about_the_game:
You Have 10 Seconds is a fast paced arcade style platformer game with over 40 levels.

In the game every single level is on a 10 second timer, so you have 10 seconds to get from the start of the level to the end without dying and before time runs out.


- Unlock new areas and collect new items to affect game play after each world.

- The game runs at 60fps for precise platforming

- Levels are quick but hard to master

- Gamepad/Controller support

- Four unique level soundtracks for each area of the game

- In game Achievments

- Free to play

Download the soundtrack!
https://tamationgames.itch.io/you-have-10-seconds-official-soundtrack

name: You Have 10 Seconds

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Windows 7, Windows 8
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB
  • Storage: 40 MB available space

reviews:
“You Have 10 Seconds does (purposely) induce rage, but it's also very addictive.”
FGP

“Very stressful, very down to the wire, but I loved it a lot.”
Markiplier
short_description: You Have 10 Seconds is a fast paced arcade style platformer game with over 40 levels.
